item.title: Big bin on pavement, 23rd December
item.description:

item.title: Large dog poo left regularly, 23rd December
item.description:
Someoneâ€™s regularly letting their dog foul pavements in Ickburgh Rd, usually on Nth side. Disgusting large deposits often right in middle of path. This one is at junct of Clapton Rd - Can council use streetcams to identify/fine the culprit?

item.title: Bin overflowing, 23rd December
item.description:
These bins are frequently overflowing. Looks disgusting given how many people are walking around the town, and to and from the park, near to Xmas. The one opposite at the other bus stop just as bad. Needs a proper solution, ie more bins, or more frequent collection.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Southend Road, Beckenham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Ripped and overflowing waste bags, 23rd December
item.description:
Households in this block continuously leave their waste on the street before collection days, so they get ripped up by foxes and people dump rubbish on top of them

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Beatty Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Building Materials, 23rd December
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 29, Northcote Road, Longlands, Sidcup, Greater London
